moves.title: Other
changes: Ledge stand invincibility normalized with the rest of the cast

moves.title: Up Air
changes: Endlag matched to previous versions; Charizard should now completely match older versions

moves.title: Other
changes: Hurtbox reverted to Brawl to better match model

moves.title: Other
changes: Hurtbox modified to better match model

moves.title: Other
changes: Ledge stand invincibility normalized with the rest of the cast

moves.title: Down Air
changes: Now properly and consistently stalls while in knockback

moves.title: Side Special (Egg Roll)
changes: No longer bucket brakes

moves.title: Other
changes: Can now take advantage of UCF codes
Hurtbox modified to better match model

changes.title: Default
changes: Received visual overhaul; now more closely resembles Brawl’s version of the stage

moves.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Donkey Kong’s getup attack after slipping on a banana no longer has an excessive amount of invulnerable frames
Ivy now plays healing SFX when pummeling at 0%
Landing with Lucario’s Aura Bomb no longer crashes the game on certain frames
Light on Kirby’s Olimar hat now works for all TE-added costumes
Fixed visual errors with Pit using a Beam Sword

moves.title: Stages
changes: Various effects restored on alts of Final Destination
Character lighting on Pokemon Stadium 2 reflects purple instead of green when on-stage
Many stages optimized for file size and frame rate

moves.title: Costumes
changes: Melee Fox costumes optimized for file size and frame rate
Fierce Deity Link alt optimized for file size and frame rate
Zero Suit Samus costumes optimized for file size and frame rate

moves.title: Character Polish
changes: Hooded Diddy skins no longer have a hole in the jacket

moves.title: Other
changes: On the Beach’s loop point adjusted to closer match the original song from Yoshi’s Story
Strap and Results screens updated for version 2.27
